thread.section_title: First Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Lovely stay in an ideal location
thread.title_full: Lovely stay in an ideal location - Review of First Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: JessicaSewell5
title: Lovely stay in an ideal location
text:
Directly opposite Cambronne metro station but you wouldn't know as there's no noise through the windows! Skip the breakfast option if you want to pick up something tasty from the patisserie shop directly next door. Also 3-4 restaurants/bistros within a 30 second walk of the hotel. Buy a book of 10 tickets as there's no date restriction, you'll definitely use them all up whether you're there for 2 days or more. Hotel is very clean, dark furnishings make it romantic and staff are very friendly and helpful. 10 minute walk to Eiffel Tower too!
Room Tip: No iron available in the room so take a travel iron See more room tips
